translations.main_description: Το EGI CheckIn Service παρέχει μία ασφαλή διαδικτυακή διεπαφή από την οποία οι πάροχοι υπηρεσιών μπορούν να εγγράψουν τις OpenID Connect και SAML υπηρεσίες.
translations.reconfiguration_info: This is a reconfiguration request, changes are highlighted bellow.
translations.pending_notification: Cannot be edited while waiting deployment
translations.delete_pending_alert: Service cannot be deregistered until it is deployed
translations.confirmation_title: Are you sure sure you would like to
translations.confirmation_cancel_request: cancel the pending request for this service?
translations.request_submit_success_msg: Was submited succesfully and is currently pending approval from an administrator.
translations.request_cancel_fail_msg: 'Could not be canceled please try again. Status:
translations.edit_delete_info: User requested to deregister the following service.
translations.edit_changes_info: An administrator has reviewed your registration request and has requested changes.
translations.edit_create_pending_info: This is a registration request which is currently pending approval from an administrator. You can modify or cancel it here.
translations.view_create_info: This service is not registered yet, it is currently pending approval from an administrator
translations.changes_info_2_2: request which is currently pending approval from an administrator. You can modify or cancel it here.
translations.yup_char_min: Field doesn't satisfy minimum character requirement
translations.yup_secure_url: This must be a secure Url starting with https://
translations.yup_scope_reg: Scope must consist of small letters and underscores
translations.yup_select_option: At least one option must be selected
translations.petition_success_msg: Was submited succesfully and is currently pending approval from an administrator.
translations.petition_error_msg: Could not be submitted, please try again. Status:
translations.form_logo_desc: URL that points to a logo image, will be displayed on approval page
translations.form_policy_uri_desc: URL for the Policy Statement of this service, will be displayed to the user
translations.form_contacts_desc: List of contacts for administrators of this service.
translations.form_client_id_desc: Unique identifier. If you leave this blank it will be automatically generated.
translations.form_redirect_uris_desc: URIs that the client can be redirected to after the authorization page
translations.form_scope_desc: OAuth scopes this client is allowed to request
translations.form_code_challenge_method: Proof Key for Code Exchange (PKCE) Code Challenge Method
translations.form_allow_introspection_desc: Allow calls to the Introspection Endpoint?
translations.form_access_token_validity_seconds_desc: Enter this time in seconds, minutes, or hours (Max value is 1000000 seconds (11.5 days)).
translations.form_id_token_timeout_seconds_desc: Enter this time in seconds, minutes, or hours (Max value is 1000000 seconds (11.5 days)).
translations.form_refresh_token_validity_seconds_desc: Enter this time in seconds, minutes, or hours (Max value is 34128000 seconds (13 months)).
translations.form_reuse_refresh_tokens_scope: Refresh tokens are issued for this client
translations.form_offline_acces_desc: This will add the offline_access scope to the client's scopes.
translations.form_device_code_desc: Device code is issued for this client
translations.form_device_code_info: This will add the device grant type to your grant types.
translations.form_device_code_validity_seconds_desc: Enter this time in seconds, minutes, or hours (Max value is 34128000 seconds (13 months)).
translations.form_entity_id_desc: Unique identifier for a SAML service.
translations.form_clear_access_tokens_on_refresh: Active access tokens are automatically revoked when the refresh token is used
translations.form_metadata_url_desc: Metadata uri for a SAML service
translations.form_reuse_refresh_tokens: Refresh tokens for this client are re-used
translations.review_approve_desc: Submit feedback and approve service changes.
translations.review_reject_desc: Submit feedback and reject service changes.
translations.review_changes_desc: Submit feedback that must be addressed before changes can be made.
translations.review_comment_prompt: Leave a comment for the requester...
translations.review_comment_required_msg: Cannot request changes without leaving a comment for the requester.
translations.review_select_option_msg: You have to first select one of the options from bellow.
